name: Poppet Quest
description:
This was made for the Touch the Stars Game Jam, it's currently unfinished but hopefully shows what the engine can do. If people show interest I'll continue working on it.

Story:

Poppet's a doll in the world's most cursed attic, compelled to look out a very specific window every night at the stars, or do all that she can to reach it.

One day a strange man picks her up and puts her in a box on the other side of the attic. Now she must battle the attic's denizens to reach the other side.


Features:

All levels in Poppet Quest are randomly generated.

Action oriented combat.

A unique level/delevel mechanic to gain more power.

Lots of visuals you won't believe RPG Maker MZ can do.

Plans:

More graphics to make areas more unique.

More complex enemies and just more enemies in general.

A more complex story... Listen they gave me a month, this is what you get in a month. ;)
